Ui:
---------------------------------------------LOCALIZATION AND INITIALIZATION---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------ICON TEMPLATE---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MPowa_TextureFrame_OnUpdate(elapsed, this)
---------------------------------------------TEMPLATES AND GENERAL---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MPowa_SelectAura(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_CLOSE, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:Hide()
if (this.aide) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end
GameTooltip:Hide()
---------------------------------------------MINIMAP BUTTON---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------MAINFRAME---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this:StartMoving()
this:StopMovingOrSizing()
MPowa_OnEvent(event)
this:RegisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED") this:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_AURAS_CHANGED") this:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_ENTERING_WORLD") this:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_TARGET_CHANGED") this:RegisterEvent("UNIT_AURA") MPowa_OnLoad() this:SetClampedToScreen(true) getglobal(this:GetName().."_HEAD"):SetText(MPOWA_MAINFRAME_HEAD.." "..MPOWA_VERSION)
MPowa_MainFrame:Hide() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
MPowa_AddAura()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_ADD)
MPowa_Edit()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_EDIT)
MPowa_Remove()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_REMOVE)
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_PROFILE)
MPowa_TestAll()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_TESTALL)
MPowa_Test()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_TEST)
---------------------------------------------CONFIGURATION FRAME---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
getglobal(this:GetName().."_HEAD"):SetText(MPOWA_CONFIGFRAME_NAME)
if IsShiftKeyDown() and IsAltKeyDown() then getglobal("MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX"):SetValueStep(0.1) elseif IsShiftKeyDown() then getglobal("MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_Opacity"):SetValueStep(0.01) getglobal("MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX"):SetValueStep(1) end
getglobal("MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_Opacity"):SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal("MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX"):SetValueStep(5)
MPowa_ConfigFrame:Hide() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(0,1.0) this:SetValue(1.0) this:SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("0") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("1.0")
if LOADED then MPowa_SliderChange("alpha", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) end
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(-600,600) this:SetValue(0) this:SetValueStep(5) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(-600) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(600)
if LOADED and MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then MPowa_SliderChange("x", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX)
local min, max = this:GetMinMaxValues() local value = this:GetValue() if value == min and SLIDER_POSX_MIN then if value ~= -600 then this:SetMinMaxValues(min-50,max-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max-50) SLIDER_POSX_MIN = false end elseif value == max then if value ~= 600 and SLIDER_POSX_MAX then this:SetMinMaxValues(min+50,max+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max+50) SLIDER_POSX_MAX = false end end if value == (max - 25) then SLIDER_POSX_MAX = true elseif value == (min + 25) then SLIDER_POSX_MIN = true end end
SLIDER_POSX_MIN = true SLIDER_POSX_MAX = true
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(-600,600) this:SetValue(0) this:SetValueStep(5) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("-600") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("600")
if LOADED and MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then MPowa_SliderChange("y", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY)
local min, max = this:GetMinMaxValues() local value = this:GetValue() if value == min and SLIDER_POSY_MIN then if value ~= -600 then this:SetMinMaxValues(min-50,max-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max-50) SLIDER_POSY_MIN = false end elseif value == max then if value ~= 600 and SLIDER_POSY_MAX then this:SetMinMaxValues(min+50,max+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max+50) SLIDER_POSY_MAX = false end end if value == (max - 25) then SLIDER_POSY_MAX = true elseif value == (min + 25) then SLIDER_POSY_MIN = true end end
SLIDER_POSY_MIN = true SLIDER_POSY_MAX = true
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(0.1,2.0) this:SetValue(1.0) this:SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("0.1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("2.0")
if LOADED then MPowa_SliderChange("size", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE) end
this:SetMaxLetters(200) this.aide = MPOWA_EDITBOX_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_EDITBOX_NAME)
this:ClearFocus()
MPowa_Editbox_Name(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
this:SetMaxLetters(200) this.aide = MPOWA_EDITBOX_STACKS_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_EDITBOX_STACKS_NAME)
this:ClearFocus()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWIFNOTACTIVE_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWIFNOTACTIVE);
MPowa_Checkbutton("inverse")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWCOOLDOWN_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWCOOLDOWN);
MPowa_Checkbutton("cooldown")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER);
MPowa_Checkbutton("timer")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ENEMYTARGET_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ENEMYTARGET);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_FRIENDLYTARGET_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_FRIENDLYTARGET);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_DEBUFF_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_DEBUFF);
MPowa_Checkbutton("isdebuff")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ALIVE_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ALIVE);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_MOUNTED_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_MOUNTED);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INCOMBAT_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INCOMBAT);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INPARTY_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INPARTY);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INRAID_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INRAID);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ISBATTLEGROUND_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ISBATTLEGROUND);
MPowa_Checkbutton("target")
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(0,1.0) this:SetValue(1.0) this:SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("0") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("1.0")
if LOADED then MPowa_SliderChange("alpha", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) end

if LOADED and MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then MPowa_SliderChange("x", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX)
local min, max = this:GetMinMaxValues() local value = this:GetValue() if value == min and SLIDER_POSX_MIN then if value ~= -600 then this:SetMinMaxValues(min-50,max-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max-50) SLIDER_POSX_MIN = false end elseif value == max then if value ~= 600 and SLIDER_POSX_MAX then this:SetMinMaxValues(min+50,max+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max+50) SLIDER_POSX_MAX = false end end if value == (max - 25) then SLIDER_POSX_MAX = true elseif value == (min + 25) then SLIDER_POSX_MIN = true end end

if LOADED then MPowa_SliderChange("size", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE) end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_HUNDREDS_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_HUNDREDS);
MPowa_Checkbutton("inverse")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_COLOR_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_COLOR);
MPowa_Checkbutton("inverse")
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").r = 1.0; getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").g = 1.0; getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").b = 1.0;
Powa_OpenColorPicker();
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b); GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText(PowaText.aideColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1);
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b); GameTooltip:Hide();
PanelTemplates_SelectTab(this) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(MPowa_ConfigFrame_Tab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(MPowa_ConfigFrame_Tab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(MPowa_ConfigFrame_Tab4) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_2:Hide() MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_2_2:Hide() MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1:Show() MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2:Show()
